first_para: Brooks Phillip Victor Newmark (born 8 May 1958) is the Conservative former Member of Parliament for Braintree.

full.extract:
Brooks Phillip Victor Newmark (born 8 May 1958) is the Conservative former Member of Parliament for Braintree.
On 11 October 2014, Newmark announced that he would stand down at the 2015 general election following a sex scandal.
^ a b "Tory Brooks Newmark to quit as MP". BBC News. 11 October 2014. Retrieved 11 October 2014. 
^ "Crown Office". Retrieved 29 September 2014.
full.title: Brooks Newmark
